__inputs.description: Namespace associated with the Zenko instance
__inputs.label: namespace
__inputs.name: namespace

__inputs.description: Name of the kafka connect job to filter metrics
__inputs.label: Job
__inputs.name: job

__inputs.description: Expected number of kafka connect replicas/workers
__inputs.label: Kafka-connect replicas
__inputs.name: replicas

panels.description: Number of workers available
panels.title: Workers

panels.description: Number of connectors not running
panels.title: Connectors not running

panels.description: Average number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second
panels.title: Network IO Rate

panels.description: Bytes per second read off all sockets
panels.title: Incoming Byte Rate

panels.description: Average number of outgoing bytes sent per second to all servers
panels.title: Outgoing Byte Rate

panels.description: Current number of active connections
panels.title: Current number of active connections

panels.description: Connections that failed authentication
panels.title: Failed authentication connections

panels.description: Connections that were successfully authenticated using SASL or SSL
panels.title: Successful authentication connections

panels.description: Average number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Request rate

panels.description: Responses received and sent per second
panels.title: Responses received and sent

panels.description: Fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O
panels.title: IO Ratio

targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(count(kafka_connect_connector_info{job="${job}", namespace="${namespace}", instance=~"$instance", connector=~"$connector", status!=""}) by(instance, status), "status", "1", "status", "running"), "status", "2", "status", "paused"), "status", "3", "status", "stopped")
count(kafka_connect_connector_info{job="${job}", namespace="${namespace}", instance=~"$instance", connector=~"$connector", connector_type!=""}) by(instance, connector_type)
count(kafka_connect_connector_info{job="${job}", namespace="${namespace}", instance=~"$instance", connector=~"$connector", connector_version!=""}) by(instance, connector_version)
count(kafka_connect_connector_info{job="${job}", namespace="${namespace}", instance=~"$instance", connector=~"$connector", connector_class!=""}) by(instance, connector_class)

panels.description: Time since last rebalance
panels.title: ($instance) Time since last rebalance

panels.description: Average size of the batches processed by the connector
panels.title: Batch Size Average

panels.description: Maximum size of the batches processed by the connector
panels.title: Batch Size Max

panels.description: Average percentage of the task’s offset commit attempts that succeeded
panels.title: Offset Commit Success Percentage

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to commit offsets
panels.title: Offset Commit Average Time

panels.description: The fraction of time this task has spent in the running state
panels.title: Running Ratio

panels.description: Total number of failures seen by task
panels.title: Total record failures

panels.description: Total number of errors seen by task
panels.title: Total record errors

panels.description: Total number of records skipped by task
panels.title: Total record skipped

panels.description: The number of messages that was logged into either the dead letter queue or with Log4j
panels.title: Total errors logged

panels.description: Total number of retries made by task
panels.title: Total retries

panels.description: Number of produce requests to the dead letter queue
panels.title: Dead letter queue Produce Requests

panels.description: Number of produce requests to the dead letter queue
panels.title: Dead letter queue Produce Failures

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to poll for a batch of source records
panels.title: Poll Batch Average time

panels.description: The maximum time in milliseconds taken by this task to poll for a batch of source records
panels.title: Poll Batch Max time

panels.description: The average per-second number of records produced/polled (before transformation) by this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker.
panels.title: Source Record Poll rate

panels.description: The average per-second number of records output from the transformations and written to Kafka for this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker. This is after transformations are applied and excludes any records filtered out by the transformations.
panels.title: Source Record Write rate

panels.description: The average number of records that have been produced by this task but not yet completely written to Kafka.
panels.title: Source Record Active Count average

panels.description: The maximum number of records that have been produced by this task but not yet completely written to Kafka.
panels.title: Source Record Active Count max

panels.description: The number of topic partitions assigned to this task belonging to the named sink connector in this worker.
panels.title: Partition Count

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to put a batch of sinks records
panels.title: Put Batch Average time

panels.description: The maximum time in milliseconds taken by this task to put a batch of sinks records
panels.title: Put Batch Max time
